website_summaries.verdict: While it may take a few rounds to get used to, the overall design of this glove offers great support while minimizing blistering and sore hands.
pros: Superior construction that features heavy leather and great padding for your hands
Help wick away moisture to keep hands dry
Very comfortable, and a good fit
cons: Glove can take a few rounds to break in
Some complaints of ripping just below the padded palm area

customer_reviews.title: Get a grip... and enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is just flat-out my favorite golf glove. It fits... like a glove! The padding is excellent through the palm and the fingers and it is really durable. I have gotten much greater use out of these than other gloves that I have purchased. Plus, it is stylish. I may not land my iron shots closer to the pin with this Bionic glove but at least I look more stylish using it. Seriously, this glove is my go-to glove. If I can't find this brand and this model I feel like I'm compromising on quality. Great glove!
customer_reviews.author: Chris HamiltonTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Good for what they are, but for me.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this glove would be an improvement. The padding is quite thick. I ended up having to change the way I grip clubs. I also had to back off my swing quite a bit as I had issues controlling the club face. I think the padding removes a lot of feel. After a year of using these, I switched to a non padded glove. I felt a noticeable improvement in club feel. I also feel like I could generate more speed due to a better connection with the club. Overall I would recommend this glove if you have grip strength issues. They definitely protect the hands better. The downside is reduced feel and effective change in grip size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a work glove
customer_reviews.text: I am going to try and return this glove. I got it because I wear out my hand pad under my pinky finger. I put this glove on and it felt like I was wearing a work glove. Didn't have a great on the grip of my club. Took two shots and went bare handed the rest of the round.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Windsor

customer_reviews.title: even the large size didn't feel comfortable. Yes
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a new golf glove, I went to my local golf store and tried on every golf glove they had! I tried the women's gloves but since I have a wide hand, even the large size didn't feel comfortable. Yes, I know they stretch over time if you wear them long enough but I like it to feel snug. I finally tried on the Bionic Stable Grip in the men's Cadet size. Perfect! I even like the little ridges on the fingers which I was skeptical about initially. They have proved to wear a lot longer than other golf gloves I have had previously. I'm a confirmed Bionic glove fan!
customer_reviews.author: C. E. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove, but questionable sizing / durability
customer_reviews.text: I used to absolutely love these gloves. A ML Cadet would fit perfect and they would last forever. Over the last year or so, it seems as if the sizing has changed. Gloves are much tighter and occasionally rip apart on the thumb and forefinger seams. Disappointing as the extra padding was really good for my golf grip. I've tried using a L occasionally and have had somewhat better, but still unacceptable overall... particularly for the dollar premium. When they fit as they should and don't tear at the seam, however, I don't think there is a better glove out there.
customer_reviews.author: B Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable initial fit
customer_reviews.text: I've used Mizuno golf gloves for years. Consistent quality and fit. My old glove is apparently not offered anymore. I bought this at a higher price factoring in the "bionic" curved fit. It took a few very uncomfortable rounds before the glove was broken in. Fine now, but I'll think twice before purchasing this model again.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY Z.

customer_reviews.title: Anything to reduce costs and increase profit
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these gloves since they came on the market. But this year's product quality has drastically dropped. I've purchased two pair for the golf season with both pair ripping the seam on the index finger...junk, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, not durable
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable glove, but its durability is poor. I have played 2 rounds, 18 holes each and the glove has holes in it, as can be seen in the pictures. I did have almost daily practice sessions in between the 2 rounds, but this is the least durable glove I have ever purchased. I did buy a second glove to check if I just got a bad one the first time. Update, the second glove wore way to fast also. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JoMike

customer_reviews.title: Good feel and lasts longer than Womans equivalent glove
customer_reviews.text: Like the design of the product. Pads my joints very nicely. I buy a mens cadet as the material seems heavier that the glove lasts A LOT longer than the purported woman's Bionic "equivalent" glove. Too bad for the women as we are stuck with over twice the cost for a lesser quality glove. Shame on Bionic for this. The glove feels, and fits much better. Protects the hand more and lasts 2-3 X longer for me.
customer_reviews.author: R L Rass

customer_reviews.title: The glove that replaced them all
customer_reviews.text: The best glove I've owned so far. This isn't just another leather golf glove. Normal golf gloves are a thin sleeve for your hand. This glove feels like you're racing F1. It's thicker, more durable and has padding to prevent hand fatigue regardless of swing speed or age. I highly recommend trying this regardless if it's a little more expensive than your average glove. You get what you pay for and I'm glad I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Durable and Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: These are now my go-to brand of golf gloves. I don't seem to wear them out nearly as quickly as other gloves I've used. The materials doesn't "shed" like other, Polyurethane type-fake leathers. It also has some type of padding at the finger joints that feels good when holding your clubs. I haven't yet had a glove wear out from this brand so longevity is better than other brands who seems to fray in fewer rounds than these.
customer_reviews.author: TDP

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves on the market
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone who has always used Titleist Permasoft and FootJoy gloves, this is the best glove I have ever used. I know longer fidget with my grip during play, especially when my hands get kind of sweaty. With this glove I can grip lighter and easily find my grip when I'm setting up. I feel more relaxed and confident with this glove, so I'm actually playing better. A good golf swing starts at the grip!
customer_reviews.author: Entreri

customer_reviews.title: Very well made glove
customer_reviews.text: My hands are large especially in the square portion of the hand. Had to use Large XXX size to fit my hand. There is a small portion left at the tip because my fingers are short for the size of my hand. The glove is great in its construction and feel. I am very pleased with this purchase. It is very difficult to acquire a glove to truly five all dimentions of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Estvander

customer_reviews.title: Wore a hole in the glove after playing 9 holes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand of glove for my husband last year. He really liked the weight of that glove. I bought him this one this season, the exact same color/ style was not available in stock in his size. This one had a hole in it the first time he wore it after playing only 9 holes. He went at bought a new glove in the pro shop at the turn.
customer_reviews.author: It's Me!

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I was liking the glove when I first got it, but it already has a hole in the palm, and I have not played that many rounds of golf with it. I have had cheaper gloves last a lot longer before getting a hole in the palm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Engineer approved!
customer_reviews.text: So for many years I've used these gloves let me say to all those burning a hole in your palm or a thumb getting loose you are gripping to much towards the end of the club if you choke the club until the end doesn't rub the glove incorrectly it will last many rounds and be your best friend don't believe me then watch some you tube videos on wearing out a glove by gripping the end of the club once you correct this these gloves are durable to the end if not you will see holes in your palm and a loose thumb its basic physics. Take it from an engineer!
customer_reviews.author: kannika Pholcha

customer_reviews.title: Watch out. You may not get a white glove.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these gloves, however they picture a white glove and we received a black glove. Apparently they just do what they feel like. Doesn’t matter what you want. I’m not willing to go through the hassle of returning. Not ok to do a bait and switch. Send the item shown.
customer_reviews.author: hisgirlhoward

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy helps in humidity strange feel though
customer_reviews.text: Solid well constructed glove. I've had it a few weeks and can tell it will last longer than most if not all. Best I've found for humidity control , however, the extra padding in the palm and fingers make the feel cumbersome and just off . I liked it at first but have hit some wayward shots and it has gotten in my head now, so personally I wont buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Chevy 56

customer_reviews.title: NOT USGA APPROVED. Wish they listed that more clearly ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT USGA APPROVED. Wish they listed that more clearly in description.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: best grip over any other glove
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best gloves I have ever owned. The glove was introduced to me from a friend after I had a tablesaw accident which left my left index finger unable to bend. The way the ridges are built into the glove it allows me to grip my golf club without having to use alot of pressure. Not only has it improved my grip, the glove seems to wear alot slower than other gloves I have owned allowing me to get more rounds out of my glove. I am not an occassional golfer, I golf on average 55 to 65 rounds a year
customer_reviews.author: Mark Proulx

customer_reviews.title: 2015 to give the bionics a try So far so good (other than I'm searching ebay for V-Steel Taylor Made ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave up golf aug 18, 2014 due to arthritis in my hands Gave away 2 full sets of Taylor made irons and fairway metals Decided feb 7, 2015 to give the bionics a try So far so good (other than I'm searching ebay for V-Steel Taylor Made fairway metals and found my Rosa putter) I'm back in the game
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Techer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a good glove that fits my hand
customer_reviews.text: I have always had trouble finding a glove that fits well and that is high enough quality to last. Most quality gloves have a finger length to palm size that just does not work for me. This one fits perfectly and has lasted me for at least 20 rounds and still counting. It shows no signs of failing anytime soon. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Keycept

customer_reviews.title: Index Finger is a little short.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star, except the index finger is a little short, so it presses the seam against my finger nail enough to cause discomfort before finishing 18 holes. And my index finger is actually slightly shorter than my ring finger, so I am surprised by this and the only glove I have had this issue with.
customer_reviews.author: A1crafty

customer_reviews.title: Added 15 yards by better grip
customer_reviews.text: This has allowed me to hit the ball further and straighter and I fully believe it’s the better grip I get with the reinforcement in the gripping portions, so the club handle doesn’t twist on impact. Great comfort. More like a winter glove thickness but I am using in summer anyway and knocking them to the fences! Yikes.
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Was actually big enough for my large mitts
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble ripping the palm out of gloves that were too tight, usually in the first couple holes of play. These gloves surprised me in that they were just a bit roomier than others I have tried, and so far one glove has lasted me 4 rounds with no issues. I did, however, put the glove on at home for a few minutes to stretch out the leather and break it in.
customer_reviews.author: L. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.text: Glove fit at felt great. Wore hole through the palm in 6 rounds. That’s around 300 swings with glove on. Very disappointed, especially for the crazy price they get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This glove is roughly 5 times thicker than your typical cabretta leather glove. The club feels absolutely completely different than your typical glove. I didn't feel that it gave me more stability or anything. Overall it's very uncomfortable and alters your swing in a negative way. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Walker

customer_reviews.title: Happy, then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this golf glove on July 5th and I loved it. Unfortunately, on July 27th, I got a tear in the palm. It seemed like a very sturdy glove so I may have received one with a manufacturing flaw. I don’t know how to contact bionic so I guess I’m out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Tnev

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Glove fits well and is very comfortable. Feels "luxurious". Because of the high purchase price, I was disappointed that the first one I bought wore thru on the palm more quickly then I thought it should. But the second one has held up very well. I will buy another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Black

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall Glove.
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these gloves and they are typically known for their durability. However,I gave these a 4 star rating due to them only lasting about 2 months before ripping in the palm. I will still continue to buy because of how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this glove long, it was a Christmas present so just getting to use it, can't rate longevity, but it is a nice comfortable glove. I would recommend it if you wanted something better than the standard golf glove.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Golf glove that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Started buying these last year. Was tired of buying the taylormade/ titleist brands which would only last 2 months, at the most. These are much more durable and last a long time. They are worth the money spent on them
customer_reviews.author: Marco Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Different but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to it the padding feels different but the end of my round it was definitely worth the buy, hand doesn't hurt and I hit better later in my round when It broke in different from normal and it definitely lasted better then my name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A glove that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a golf glove that would last more than a round or two of 18. I've tried so many different brands and each time they rip almost immediately after purchasing them. The Bionic Glove is the perfect glove for people who want a product that lasts! I've been playing for months with it and not one single tear. The padding in all the right areas provides comfort and resistance to wear and tear. I highly recommend it if your sick of wasting your money on gloves that don't last!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeGori

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, durable, and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove mostly for the abundance of padding it offers. I liked the padding they had at the knuckles of each finger as it helped me to grip the club. I've used it for about 4-5 rounds of golf as well as numerous trips to the driving range. It hasn't show signs of structural wear, however there is noticeable black markings on the glove from club grips, but it's mostly cosmetic and also to be expected. Overall it's a great glove and I will purchase more once it wears out. I would recommend this to anyone searching for a good reliable golf glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Luke David

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Wore through my palm by the 15th hole of their first round. Fit well and Comfortable while it lasted. In fairness, I wear through every glove quickly, so this wasn’t a big exception, but I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Soft Leather
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as part of a gift for a family secret Santa, and the guy who got it was most excited about this part of the gift. He said he’d never had such a nice golf glove before. It’s a really nice soft leather.
customer_reviews.author: DDH

customer_reviews.title: Glove does not last for the price.
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money, receive July 14th and the glove now has a hole in the thumb on 8-31. The same thing happen on a glove I previous ordered. Never buy again. I can get 3 $10.00 gloves from Dick's sporting goods that would last from June through September.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Angels started singing when I put my hand in for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove - ha ha. But in all seriousness, it actually fits even better than that. The glove is very thoughtfully designed and has contours and padding in all the right places. I was a bit hesitant at the price point but tried one on at a golf store and angels started singing in my head. I would recommend sizing though in person if possible as I wear a different size for this one than I do in my cheapo-glove.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf glove. I have extremely wide hands and finding a glove that suits the cadet hand can be a bit hard. I was excited to find that the glove is actually really comfortable and holds up in rain and sweat. Definitely ordering another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard of Golf Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Better for older hands and fit the curve of your hand naturally ! Grip the club better, wear pretty well also. I'd never wear another glove than these... Absolutely Excellent...!
customer_reviews.author: Stbentoak

customer_reviews.title: Bionic Golf Glove
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this glove brand and type for many seasons. It is the only one I look for . I have told friends as well and they really like them as well. Very good and durable product.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feel. Will only wear this type glove moving forward. Helps with arthritis and promotes a light grip. Our golf store has these as demo gloves when hitting the bay. Big difference after you use a normal glove afterwards. A little pricey so I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap to be true but it is.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for 10 years. Last one lasted a good 2 years. I paid $26 a piece at retail store. With $9.99 for a small black version, I was concerned if it is fake but to my surprise, it is authentic Bionic glove. Ordered 2 more as backup.
customer_reviews.author: L. H

customer_reviews.title: Hesitated spending this much on a glove but I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had and old one my dad gave me from this brand for about a decade and it finally was getting a hole in it. Hesitated spending this much on a glove but I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thad H.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting glove
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this glove is very good... It does have raised sections designed to help with your group and keep the club secure in your hand. This definitely takes a little getting used to but after you don't even realize that they are there
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for above average older golfer
customer_reviews.text: Have played over 50 rounds with it. Sweat-stained but still performing great. Bought a second one for "show" when I'm not playing the muni.A good stabilizing glove. Helps my arthritic hand without feeling bulky or stiff. Will buy again. Glad that people buy and return items like this to amazon.com so that I can buy them at a good price because the packaging has been damaged. Keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: RevDocJohn

customer_reviews.title: Best golf glove out there.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves out there. There is no slipping at all. I have big hands and the glove's thickness also helps me get a better grip. I live in the tropics, and humidity is always high, so there is a lot of sweating during my golf rounds. Sweat is no issue with these gloves. They are a bit expensive, but outlast the $15 gloves, so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Diver M

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing quality. This glove only lasted from August to October before falling apart. I had a bionic one before that lasted well over a year before it developed a rip.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a confident grip.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to grip the club tighter than you really need to so this glove has let me feel I can ease up and still have good control of the swing. It's also very comfortable and it holds up better than some other gloves I have used. It's definitely worth the extra money it costs to me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Glove Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best golf glove I’ve ever used. Very long-lasting, comfortable and great fitting. As a bonus, it enhances your grip of the golf club. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lakers1_x

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves feels great. The ridges in the fingers take some getting used to but may hands feel batter after a rounds which and I can control the club.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Watson III

customer_reviews.title: These were recommended by my orthopedic surgeon
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and wear 2 bionic gloves. These were recommended by my orthopedic surgeon. They fit great and last through many rounds of golf. Living in Florida I play twice a week and these gloves have helped. Highly recommended to anyone who has hurting hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Zipay

customer_reviews.title: Wore a hole in the palm in 3 rounds of Golf!
customer_reviews.text: Played 3 rounds of golf and there's a hole in the palm of the glove already. Every golf glove I've owned, even the less expensive brands have lasted 20+ rounds or 4+ months of use before breaking down in such a fashion. WOW! Would like the glove otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: F. Cross

customer_reviews.title: good quality but gave my nongloved ring finger a blister
customer_reviews.text: the padding of the index finger on the glove rubs my ring finger skin raw. will need athletic tape. this was not a problem with the performance grip version of the bionic glove
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vo

customer_reviews.title: Love These Golves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well for me. I have been using them for almost a decade and love them. The price was great and so I got a couple of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than all others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: After buying several more expensive gloves I’ve settled on these as my favorite. They are built extremely well and provide great feel.
customer_reviews.author: T. F.P

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite golf gloves.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite golf gloves. Super comfortable and I love the extra padded align grips. It allows for a lighter grip while still maintaining control.
customer_reviews.author: W33P

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves really give a support feeling while swinging. Also it's very very durable compared to other gloves I have used. I really like the support pads inside the palm. My gloves are usually torn from that area and this gloves do tend to last longer for that reason (at least for me) One thing is this glove really is thick. Some golfers might not like that feeling. When I switch gloves I really feel like the other gloves are loose in my hand. I'd say at least give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: ubp

customer_reviews.title: Best glove I have tried in 30+ years
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this glove costs more at the time of purchase, but this glove outlasts 3 "normal" gloves, so the cost is probably about even. The up side to this golf glove is that it is also more comfortable than the low-end types. If you play a lot, you should try it once.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable that I bought my husband this pair and he loves them. He plays several times a week and always wears the glove. It has held up better than others he has had and as we are senior players, the grip is better.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Works for RA hands that won't close.
customer_reviews.text: Got large rather than med-large as the glove padding takes up more room. Perfect fit. One glove got me through the whole season.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: If your hands are too big for your grips this can help. While I use midsized grips, these comfortable gloves make the fit right. Durable and never had 1 rip. Usually 2 per year works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: The glove is comfortable and wears like iron.
customer_reviews.text: This glove lasts two or three times longer than other gloves. I have been using these gloves for about ten years and I prefer the grip that you get from the built up area and the long life of the glove. The heat and humidity in Florida is rough on traditional leather gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pleiman

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Glove I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool design, almost makes me want to putt with it, and I have putted without a glove my whole 18 years of playing Golf.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great glove, but...
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable glove I've ever used, but 4 weeks after using, I wore a hole in the palm of the glove just below the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Not Sized Properly
customer_reviews.text: I love Bionic gloves! I have been wearing them for many years. Suddenly, XXL is a different fit than it was last year. Make sure you purchase a size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wore out in 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The glove fit perfectly and helped with the arthritis in my fingers but it wore out at the reinforced location at the edge of my palm. I sent a message to the seller over a week ago and have not heard back. If this is how this glove lasts then it's not worth the price. I used it about 12 times.
customer_reviews.author: kamil s

customer_reviews.title: The best golf gloves made!
customer_reviews.text: Bionic makes fantastic golf gloves, which I've been using for years. Will never switch to another kind, they won't last or hold shape as well as these do!
customer_reviews.author: B Way

customer_reviews.title: 5 rounds in and the glove is DONE!
customer_reviews.text: This glove was comfortable but by the 4th hole of my 5th round, this glove now has a hole. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. NB

customer_reviews.title: Best Glove I have ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: This glove is most durable glove I have ever owned. I have played over 30 rounds with it and it is still in great shape. In the past I was replacing gloves every 30 days because I have a tight grip . I highly recommend this glove to every golfer out there for comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I have been using this bionic glove for several years. I love the padding on the palm. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: Bionic Golf Gloves are worth the extra money. Once you use it, there's no going back. The finger grips pads are excellent. I find that the cost is offset by how long and well they last.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Balzarini

customer_reviews.title: Great glove, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This glove has been fantastic on adjusting my grip so I’m not squeezing too tight and hooking the ball. Using this glove for the first time, and every single driver shot went dead straight. I’m not saying this will do that for you, but it definitely helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Seem to wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: The glove fits as expected and feels good on my hand. The glove does not slip on your clubs at all. The only negative is that they seem to wear out fairly quickly. Ive only played a few rounds with this one and it is already in need of replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A great glove!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different types of gloves and feel this is the best one I have ever tried. It did take a little while to break in and was a bit tight at first. I really like it and will definitely get another should I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Don Mac

customer_reviews.title: The best golf glove you can get!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is a game changer! It improves grip stability, which leads to crisper shots. Definitely a confidence builder! It also fits well and is very durable!
customer_reviews.author: C-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Best golf glove
customer_reviews.text: This is the only golf glove I wear. It’s very comfortable and lasts a long time. Extremely soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mellinger

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable glove
customer_reviews.text: The title does not lie, it’s definitely the most durable golf glove I’ve ever used. I’ve played about 2 dozen rounds and a handful of trips to the driving range with it and there’s not so much as a tear in this glove. 100% recommend if you’re tired of gloves ripping/tearing way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Glove I have every used
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. Seems like you have better grip on the club than the smooth finger type.
customer_reviews.author: My sister calls me Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I like this glove a lot
customer_reviews.text: This one doesn't wear out the way the others do. I play a lot and this will be my second glove. It outlasts the standard glove 6 to 1.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brisko

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great for any golfer who is having problems with arthritis in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Love this model. Perfect comfort and durability. Often wear one on each hand. Relieves soreness in joints. I have ordered Bionic gloves over the years to replace ones with holes (100+ rounds). Very minor trade off in feel.
customer_reviews.author: HLMn

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: The glove lasted three times as long as the brand name, well regarded gloves that I had been using. Typically, my gloves wear out first in the butt of the palm. The first glove I bought is still usable because there is just more leather in the product. The fit feels different at first; but, I got used to it quickly. Highly recommended - I ordered two more last week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3xl and actually fits my hand correctly and durability is great
customer_reviews.text: The 3xl actually fits my hand nice. Other gloves rip and hole up after a round or two. These gloves are still in perfect shape after multiple rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Glove - PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from feeling just amazing when you have a club in your hand due to the ingenious padding in the knuckles, these gloves are tougher and hold up longer than any other glove I have tried - which is all of them. If you often get rips or tears on your palm and have to replace your glove more often than you would like, try these!! They solved that problem for me. Cannot say enough good things about this glove!!
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the glove so far ( I've only used titleist leather before). Too soon to vote on longevity and durability but it looks solid so far. Glove does not feel bulky or inflexible despite added heft from traditional gloves
customer_reviews.author: john Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved these gloves. Last two I bought were defective and bionic backed them 100% within their warranty. I’ll keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: S-borg

customer_reviews.title: Love this glove
customer_reviews.text: Love my glove. Wears out kinda fast but it’s the only glove I play with.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove is great and has helped with my game. However it does not last as long as other gloves I've used. I've gone through several over the past year and found them wearing out pretty quickly. But, I'll continue to use them and hope the durability will improve over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get old fast
customer_reviews.text: they disintegrate in a few months, especially when sweating. They keep raising the price on these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these every couple years for Christmas! My father’s favorite golf ball!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and long lived.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a XL Cadet. Perfect fit, and they last!!! Sure, they are more expensive than the competition, but when they outlast the others 3 to 1, the Bionics are a real bargain. Most comfortable glove I have ever worn, and the little pads in the fingers certainly increase the grip on the club.
customer_reviews.author: Don Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Can't address longevity, since I just received this. However, it fits well, and is a durable mate to the left glove that I had ordered previously.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband who loves this glove! He has a 3X hand so the fit is great. Not all brands carry his size.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mead

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove!
customer_reviews.text: I Iike this glove. Probably my favorite golf glove so far. Only 4 stars because my scores haven't dropped any, and I'm not sure that M/L was the right size. My hands sweat a lot, and I've only had the glove a week, so the durability factor is unclear. I'm going to order a Large as soon as I'm done typing this review!
customer_reviews.author: Brain King

customer_reviews.title: Almost gave up golf
customer_reviews.text: I had to give up golf because I couldn’t grip the club properly any more because of arthritis and a nerve disease. A friend told me about a glove that he thought might help. This glove solved the problem. Takes a little getting used to, but is fantastic. I may not be a scratch golfer, but I'm back enjoying the game.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the most durable glove I have ever owned. I have blackl and white versions, but the black is best because it does not soil. The leather is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Bionic Glove
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel. Had the best round in awhile first time out with it. Not sure about longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to longevity but it seems quite good and nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk-C

product_meta.title: Bionic Gloves –Men’s StableGrip Golf Glove W/ Patented Natural Fit Technology Made from Long Lasting, Durable Genuine Cabretta Leather.
product_meta.description: Bionic's StableGrip with Natural Fit are quality golf gloves designed to improve your grip. Whether you're an experienced golfer or just learning, anyone's game can benefit from Bionic's patented pad technology. Three-dimensional finger pads and a tapered finger design conforms to the natural shape and contours of your hand to provide superior grip, comfort, and durability with every swing.
feature_bullets: Three dimensional finger pads wrap around fingers to stabilized grip
Bionic patented pad technology provides 2x more durability than standard leather golf gloves and helps retain new glove feel round after round
Tapered finger design conforms to the Individual shape of your fingers for a more natural fit
Mini towels inside provide superior moisture management to keep the hand drier and more comfortable
Easy grab tab makes glove removal simple and quick
